realtimeweb.weatherservice.domain
Class Forecast

Object
  realtimeweb.weatherservice.domain.Forecast

public class Forecast
extends Object

A prediction for future weather.

Constructor Detail

Forecast

public Forecast(JsonObject json,
                Gson gson)
Internal constructor to create a Forecast from a Json representation.

Parameters:
json - The raw json data that will be parsed.
gson - The Gson parser. See https://code.google.com/p/google-gson/ for more information.

Forecast

public Forecast(String periodName,
                String periodTime,
                String temperatureLabel,
                int temperature,
                int probabilityOfPrecipitation,
                String description,
                String imageUrl,
                String longDescription)
Regular constructor to create a Forecast.

Parameters:
periodName - A human-readable name for this time period (e.g. Tonight or Saturday).
periodTime - A string representing the time that this period starts. Encoded as YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS, where the T is not a number, but a always present character (e.g. 2013-07-30T18:00:00).
temperatureLabel - Either 'High' or 'Low', depending on whether or not the predicted temperature is a daily high or a daily low.
temperature - The predicted temperature for this period (in Fahrenheit).
probabilityOfPrecipitation - The probability of precipitation for this period (as a percentage).
description - A human-readable description of the predicted weather for this period.
imageUrl - A url pointing to a picture that describes the predicted weather for this period.
longDescription - A more-detailed, human-readable description of the predicted weather for this period.
